briefdescription.para: Round to nearest and halfway cases away from zero.
Flag to pass INT64_MIN/MAX through instead of rescaling, this avoids special cases for AV_NOPTS_VALUE.

detaileddescription.para: Return the greatest common divisor of a and b. If both a and b are 0 or either or both are <0 then behavior is undefined.

memberdef.argsstring: (int64_t a, int64_t b, int64_t c) av_const
memberdef.name: av_rescale

detaileddescription.para: Rescale a 64-bit integer with rounding to nearest. A simple a*b/c isn't possible as it can overflow.

memberdef.argsstring: (int64_t a, int64_t b, int64_t c, enum AVRounding) av_const
memberdef.name: av_rescale_rnd

detaileddescription.para: Rescale a 64-bit integer with specified rounding. A simple a*b/c isn't possible as it can overflow.

simplesect.para: rescaled value a, or if AV_ROUND_PASS_MINMAX is set and a is INT64_MIN or INT64_MAX then a is passed through unchanged.

memberdef.argsstring: (int64_t a, AVRational bq, AVRational cq) av_const
memberdef.name: av_rescale_q

detaileddescription.para: Rescale a 64-bit integer by 2 rational numbers.

memberdef.argsstring: (int64_t a, AVRational bq, AVRational cq, enum AVRounding) av_const
memberdef.name: av_rescale_q_rnd

detaileddescription.para: Rescale a 64-bit integer by 2 rational numbers with specified rounding.

simplesect.para: rescaled value a, or if AV_ROUND_PASS_MINMAX is set and a is INT64_MIN or INT64_MAX then a is passed through unchanged.

memberdef.argsstring: (int64_t ts_a, AVRational tb_a, int64_t ts_b, AVRational tb_b)
memberdef.name: av_compare_ts

detaileddescription.para:
Compare 2 timestamps each in its own timebases. The result of the function is undefined if one of the timestamps is outside the int64_t range when represented in the others timebase.
-1 if ts_a is before ts_b, 1 if ts_a is after ts_b or 0 if they represent the same position
Compare 2 integers modulo mod. That is we compare integers a and b for which only the least significant log2(mod) bits are known.

simplesect.para: a negative value if a is smaller than b a positive value if a is greater than b 0 if a equals b

memberdef.argsstring: (AVRational in_tb, int64_t in_ts, AVRational fs_tb, int duration, int64_t *last, AVRational out_tb)
memberdef.name: av_rescale_delta

detaileddescription.para: Rescale a timestamp while preserving known durations.

memberdef.argsstring: (AVRational ts_tb, int64_t ts, AVRational inc_tb, int64_t inc)
memberdef.name: av_add_stable

detaileddescription.para: Add a value to a timestamp.
This function gurantees that when the same value is repeatly added that no accumulation of rounding errors occurs.
